channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very noisy loose and sunken manhole cover, 9th March
item.description:
On Cheltenham Road East just passed Kilminster Court heading towards Innsworth Lane junction almost opposite closed off bus stop. Been problematic for several weeks and very noisy the last two weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Station Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Traffic Lights incorrect., 9th March
item.description:
These need looking at urgently. Cars on the main road are getting fed up with waiting long periods of time for the lights to change with no other traffic coming out of the side roads so they just go through red lights. I've been almost hit twice now. CAN YOU GET THE LIGHTS SORTED!!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: 4 drains in a row completely block., 9th March
item.description:
This road floods everytime it rains and been like it for the last six months. The blocked drains start from corner of Sandford Road and old Bath Road and 4 drains running along Sandford Road are blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandford Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
